type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Can Have Effect

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/can_have_effect).

Checks whether the entity isn't immune to the specified status effect.

Type ID: `apugli:can_have_effect`



---

effect.description: ID of the status effect the condition should check.
